info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 12:22PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA AND CATTARAUGUS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1220 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Westfield to near Weston Mills and moving east at 5 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Jamestown, Olean, Fredonia, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Westfield, Lakewood, Falconer, Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, Mayville, Long Point State Park, SUNY Fredonia, Weston Mills, St. Bonaventure, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Jamestown West and Chautauqua. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 60. Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 27. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
